<style>
  :root{
    --brand:#6A0DAD; --brand-100:#f8f1fb; --text:#0f172a;

  .hero p{ margin:0; color:#4b5563; max-width:75ch; }

  .btn-row{ display:flex; gap:12px; flex-wrap:wrap; margin-top:10px; }
  .btn{ display:inline-block; border-radius:999px; padding:12px 18px;
    background:var(--brand); color:#fff; text-decoration:none; font-weight:600;
    box-shadow:0 10px 20px rgba(106,13,173,.25); }
  .btn--ghost{ background:#fff; color:var(--brand); border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.08); }
  .btn:hover{ filter:brightness(0.97); }

  .grid{ display:grid; gap:20px; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(260px, 1fr)); margin:1.25rem 0 2rem; }
  .card{ background:#fff; border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.06); border-radius:var(--radius); padding:20px; box-shadow:var(--shadow); text-align:center; }
  .card h3{ margin:.25rem 0 .5rem 0; font-size:1.05rem; color:var(--brand); }
  .card p{ margin:0; color:#374151; }
  .status-badge{ display:inline-block; padding:4px 12px; border-radius:999px; font-size:.8rem; font-weight:600; margin-bottom:10px; }
  .live{ background:#28a745; color:#fff; }
  .soon{ background:#ffc107; color:#222; }

  .section{ margin: 18px 0 8px; }
  .section h2{ margin: 0 0 8px; font-size: 1.35rem; }

  .stats{ display:grid; grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fit,minmax(150px,1fr)); gap:16px; margin-top:1.5rem; }
  .stat-card{ background:#fff; border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.06); border-radius:var(--radius); box-shadow:var(--shadow); padding:20px; text-align:center; }
  .stat-card .num{ font-size:1.6rem; font-weight:700; color:var(--brand); }
  .stat-card .label{ margin:0; font-size:.9rem; color:#6b7280; }

  .fox-banner{ background: linear-gradient(135deg,#faf5ff,#fdfdfd); padding:3rem 1rem; text-align:center; margin-top:3rem; border-top:2px solid #eee; border-radius:16px; }
  .fox-banner img{ max-width:180px; margin-bottom:1rem; filter:drop-shadow(0 6px 12px rgba(0,0,0,.1)); }
  .fox-banner p{ font-size:1.2rem; font-weight:500; margin-bottom:1rem; }
  .fox-banner strong{ color:var(--brand); }

  /* dark mode */
  .quarto-dark .hero, .quarto-dark .card, .quarto-dark .stat-card, .quarto-dark .fox-banner{
    background:#14161a; border-color:rgba(255,255,255,.06); color:#e7e8ea;
  }
  .quarto-dark .hero p, .quarto-dark .label{ color:#c9c9c9; }
  .quarto-dark .btn--ghost{ background:#0f1115; color:#e7e8ea; border-color:rgba(255,255,255,.08); }
</style>
